    • getValue

      public double getValue(Statement statement, String query, String columnName) throws SQLException
      Get value as a double after executing a query
      Parameters:
      statement - SQL statement for the session
      query - The SQL query that will be executed
      columnName - The column name containing the value we will return
      Returns:
      The value (double)
      Throws:
      SQLException - errors with the database connection
